author: rovere
body:
This will bring DQMGUI 8.3.7
- Improve reg-exp checks on uploaded files (to be propagated to proper clients of DQMGUI)
- restructure VisDQMUpload script
- apply custom user range also on overlaid histograms, so that stat-boxes all agree on the same statistics
- allow the user to overlay plots w/o any normalization
title: DQMGUI 837
